name: Homage: Godless Grotto
description:
Rejoice, lineage of Goblin! You have been granted the divine mercy of the gods! Gather your four most capable soldiers and encase them in shining bronze. In one arm, let each carry a long spear, and in the other a hefty shield. Send them with ample provisions, for the path they travel will be difficult. Know that they may not return, but it is in service of the gods that they die. Should they succeed in their task, your people will again look upon the fields of Gracoa.

Key features:
  • Split screen for 1-4 players
  • Permadeath
  • Customize your goblid to your liking
  • Train your skills to become capable warriors
  • Battle dangerous enemies in a survival scenario
  • Utilize weapons and armor in combat
  • Craft potions to enhance yourself or deal damage
